# actions

**Instance Property**

The array of actions available on the alert.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var actions: [CPAlertAction] { get }
```

## Discussion

The array must include at least one action.

## Getting the Alert Information

- **titleVariants**: The array of title variants.
title: actions
